_sText:
This is it, ladies and gentlemen.
After many years of waiting, the day has finally come.

I present to you, the most balanced map in CS:S history.
Nevermore shall you hear complaints of a map being "too CT-sided" or "having too many hiding spots."

After many years of work and thousands of rounds of strenuous playtesting from millions of CS:S players worldwide including pro players like kennyS and pashabiceps, I was able to determine that this map is as balanced as a Counter-Strike map could ever get. There are no cheeky plant spots, headglitch spots, or any advantages for either team. This map is 100% balanced.

You're welcome, CS:S community.
